channel.title: Invisible folder error
channel.description: this is from a tutorial from tutorials, tricks, and tweaks, i made an invisible folder and i cant delete it (in vista)

item.title: Invisible folder error
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

blah bah7:

havent tried it yet, but it seems like smartftp will work

ITS DOESNT MATTER WHAT FTP CLIENT YOU USE!!!

_>

You just need a different ways of deleting ur files, that’s why windows has sucks problems.

EDIT: either of these should work…

http://www.snapfiles.com/get/moveonboot.html - MoveOnBoot
http://ccollomb.free.fr/unlocker/ - Unlocker

For either of them, just right click the file.

MoveOnBoot - Right click the file, moveonboot.
Unlocker - Right click the file, unlock, action -> remove.

Read full topic

I reccomend FileZilla

FileZilla is the worse FTP client I’ve ever used, I tried transferring several files and about 1.3 ratio got corrupt(1 corrupt to 3 working).

Anyway, I assume it’s in your desktop, but if it isn’t, try and delete the containing folder.
[/quote]
Lol, it gives me no problems what so ever.
Maybe it loves meh <3
What FTP client do you use?[/quote]

SmartFTP at the minute.

item.title: Invisible folder error
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

LOL, this error, yeh I know, it’s annoying. I couldn’t delete it too, Kinda forgot how I deleted it.
So, let’s follow through.

  1. Reverse the invisibility by going to it’s properties, Customize, Change Icon, and pick something visible.
  2. Get an FTP client (I reccomend FileZilla) and on the local frame, navigate to where your invisible folder is, right click on it, and delete it.

Read full topic
